name: Horizontal Escalator Simulator Beta
description:
Have you ever been at an airport, and "rode" the horizontal escalators, and thought "I WOULD LOVE TO RUN ONE OF THESE!"

Well, by the people who made Farming Simulator 1987, it's Horizontal Escalator Simulator!

game lore:

guy: *brings up horizontal escalator*

springtrap: fuck yes

game lore end.

Updates to come! Even if this is a joke.
